com.brightcove.commons.catalog.objects
Class Playlist

java.lang.Object
  com.brightcove.commons.catalog.objects.Playlist

public class Playlist
extends java.lang.Object

A Playlist object (the metadata defining a playlist).

This object is defined primarily by the Media API documentation for a Playlist object: http://support.brightcove.com/en/docs/media-api-objects-reference#Playlist.

This may be modified however from the Media API documentation so that it can also support other interfaces (e.g. batch provisioning).

The Playlist object is a collection of Videos.

Author:
three4clavin

Constructor Detail

Playlist

public Playlist()

Default Constructor.

All fields set to null to start - required fields must be set before calling Write Media API.

Playlist

public Playlist(java.lang.String json)
         throws org.json.JSONException

Constructor using JSON string.

Given a JSON string from the Media API, attempts to construct a new Playlist object and fill out all of the fields defined. All other fields will be null.

Throws:
org.json.JSONException

initAll

public void initAll()

Fully initializes the playlist object by setting all fields to null

getId

public java.lang.Long getId()

Gets the id for this Playlist.

Property name: id
Type: Long
Read only?: yes
Description: A number that uniquely identifies the Playlist. This id is automatically assigned when the Playlist is created.

Returns:
The id for this Playlist

getReferenceId

public java.lang.String getReferenceId()

Gets the reference id for this Playlist.

Property name: referenceId
Type: String
Read only?: no
Description: A user-specified id, limited to 150 characters, that uniquely identifies this Playlist. Note that the find_playlists_by_reference_ids method cannot handle referenceIds that contain commas, so you may want to avoid using commas in referenceId values.

Returns:
Reference id for this Playlist

getAccountId

public java.lang.Long getAccountId()

Gets the account id for this Playlist.

Property name: accountId
Type: long
Read only?: yes
Description: A number that uniquely identifies the account to which this Playlist belongs, assigned by Brightcove.

Returns:
Account id for this Playlist

getName

public java.lang.String getName()

Gets the name (title) for this Playlist.

Property name: name
Type: String
Read only?: no
Description: The title of this Playlist, limited to 100 characters. The name is a required property when you create a playlist.

Returns:
Name of the Playlist

getShortDescription

public java.lang.String getShortDescription()

Gets the short description for this Playlist.

Property name: shortDescription
Type: String
Read only?: no
Description: A short description describing the Playlist, limited to 250 characters.

Returns:
Short description for this Playlist

public java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getVideoIds()

Gets the Video Ids for this Playlist.

Property name: videoIds
Type: List
Read only?: no
Description: A list of the ids of the Videos that are encapsulated in the Playlist.

Returns:
Video Ids for this Playlist

getVideos

public java.util.List<Video> getVideos()

Gets the Videos for this Playlist.

Property name: videos
Type: List
Read only?: no
Description: A list of the Video objects that are encapsulated in the Playlist.

Returns:
Videos for this Playlist

getPlaylistType

public PlaylistTypeEnum getPlaylistType()

Gets the type for this Playlist.

Property name: playlistType
Type: Enum
Read only?: no
Description: For a manual playlist, set this to EXPLICIT. For a smart playlist, indicate how to order the playlist by setting this to one of the following choices:
OLDEST_TO_NEWEST (by activated date)
NEWEST_TO_OLDEST (by activated date)
START_DATE_OLDEST_TO_NEWEST
START_DATE_NEWEST_TO_OLDEST ALPHABETICAL (by video name)
PLAYSTOTAL
PLAYS_TRAILING_WEEK

The playlistType is a required property when you create a playlist.

Returns:
Type for this Playlist

getFilterTags

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFilterTags()

Gets the filter tags for this Playlist.

Property name: filterTags
Type: List
Read only?: no
Description: A list of the tags that apply to this smart playlist. For example:

"filterTags":["Sitka","ticks"]

Returns:
Filter tags for this Playlist

getThumbnailUrl

public java.lang.String getThumbnailUrl()

Gets the thumbnail URL for this Playlist.

Property name: thumbnailURL
Type: String
Read only?: yes
Description: The URL of the thumbnail associated with this Playlist.

Returns:
Thumbnail URL for this Playlist
